KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Number varp 001
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: range kurtosis skew stdev stdevp var
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: standard deviation variance distribution population curve displacement mean

Example.Description: This example defines the values of an entire population in the argument list. The stdev function computes the variance of the population values.

Syntax.Note: Computes the variance of 6 popluation values.
